content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 25.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler at position (-11.5, 25.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position (-11.5, 18.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position ) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### Lab at position(2.5, -18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (2.5, -18.5)

### Electric pole group
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole at position (-11.5, 26.5)
- Small electric pole at position (-8.5, 23.5)

### Pipe network
Consists of the following entities:
- Multiple pipes connecting the offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure there are no obstructions between the offshore pump and the boiler before attempting to connect them. Clear any pipes or other entities that may block the connection.
- Verify that the positions of the entities you are trying to connect are correct and that they are of compatible types.

### Errors when accessing entities
- Confirm the existence of an entity at the specified position before attempting to access it. In this case, ensure that a lab is present at position (2.5, -18.5) before trying to connect or interact with it.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
